args.query: query Events($fromBlock: Int!, $toBlock: Int!) { events: dex_swap_event(where: {block_id: {_gte: $fromBlock, _lte: $toBlock}}, order_by: [{block_id: asc}, {tx_index: asc}, {event_index: asc}], limit: 1000) { eventType: event_type block { blockNumber: level blockTimestamp: timestamp } txnId: tx_id txnIndex: tx_index eventIndex: event_index maker: maker pairId: pair_id asset0In: amount_0_in asset1In: amount_1_in asset0Out: amount_0_out asset1Out: amount_1_out priceNative: price reserves {asset0: asset_0 asset1: asset_1}}}
